Name: Deep Dragon Wyrmling
Speed: 30 ft., burrow 15 ft., fly 60 ft., swim 30 ft.
Senses: blindsight 10 ft., darkvision 90 ft., passive Perception 13
Actions: Bite. Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage. Nightmare Breath (Recharge 5â€“6). The dragon exhales a cloud of spores in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 11 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 5 (1d10) psychic damage, and it is frightened of the dragon for 1 minute. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage with no additional effects. A frightened creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
